story.text: Wal-Mart Stores Inc. (WMT.N) said it began a voluntary nationwide food product recall of certain lots of its store brand trail mix after reports of finding glass in the product.Wal-Mart removed affected lots of Sam's Choice "Nature Trail" trail mix from sale. The product was supplied to Wal-Mart by Ann's House of Nuts, the world's biggest retailer said in a statement.(Reporting by Ankur Relia in Bangalore)
story.title: wal - mart recalls trail mix after reports of glass in product
